name: GT Lorem Ipsum Club
shortDesc: Our purpose is to strive to understand the ways of Lorem Ipsum, a famous Roman philosopher known for pioneering the world of modern UI/UX design by writing gibberish everywhere where actual words werenâ€™t needed.

## Blockquotes


> Blockquotes can also be nested...

> > > ...or with "spaces" between 'arrows'.

faq.question: What do most people like about Lorem Ipsum Club?
faq.answer: Ipsum Workshops: Hands-on training sessions that teach the skill of incorporating 'Lorem Ipsum' into various design mediums, be it websites, apps, or print.
